word_mean: 肢体切断：肢体或其一部分的截断术

sentence.Network_cn: 他们发现了一个令人难以置信的恐怖场景，里面是各种腐烂和被肢解的尸体。

sentence.Network_en: At a few places, inclusions can be seen to be derived by dismemberment of partings.
sentence.Network_cn: 在少数地方可见到由夹层肢解而成的包裹体.

sentence.Network_en: He committed a serious offence and will be executed by dismemberment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他犯了重罪,要被陵迟处死了.

entry.def: Dismemberment is the cutting or pulling into pieces of a body.

example.ex: They found a scene of unbelievable horror involving bodies in various states of decay and dismemberment.
example.tran: 他们发现了一个令人难以置信的恐怖场景，里面是各种腐烂和被肢解的尸体。

entry.def: Dismemberment is the breaking up into smaller parts of a country or organization.

example.ex: ...the dismemberment of Pakistan and the creation of Bangladesh in 1971.
example.tran: 1971 年巴基斯坦的分裂和孟加拉国的建立

example.ex: ...the case for dismemberment or even abolition of the BBC.
example.tran: 英国广播电台的分解甚至废除的问题

means.word_mean: 1. the removal of limbs; being cut to pieces

auth_sentence.content: Several bones showed cutting tool marks consistent with dismemberment.
auth_sentence.res_content: Several bones showed cutting tool marks consistent with dismemberment.

auth_sentence.content: He has been an influential advocate of the dismemberment of Iraq and the independence of Kurdistan.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He has been an influential advocate of the dismemberment of Iraq and the independence of Kurdistan.

auth_sentence.content: And they remain the best guarantee against the generals' worst nightmare: the dismemberment of Ataturk's secular republic.
auth_sentence.res_content: And they remain the best guarantee against the generals' worst nightmare: the dismemberment of Ataturk's secular republic.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And they remain the best guarantee against the generals' worst nightmare: the dismemberment of Ataturk's secular republic.
